message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal considering the inflation working against us.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the inflation will affect your share more than mine.  Let's be reasonable and end this quickly.
Bob, let's be realistic. I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, but your previous offer was too much. I propose a 55/45 split - it's a compromise that benefits us both.
